attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Jo Frost aka Supernanny should have an MBE for services to parents, children and families over the world.  Jo-Jo teaches and demostrates discipline in a logical non-emotional way that has proven to be invaluable to each and every one of us.  This information enables so many of us to move forward with parenting without the prolonged stress and heartache of mis-communication with our kids.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
